palette.title: A Thousand Rainbows
palette.description: I really don't know that I have anything left to say that I haven't said already. Except that I don't feel that I can possibly say enough times just how wonderful I think this place is and just how extraordinary you all are. I think I'll retire from making celebratory palettes after this one so I do hope it brings you joy. Thankyou a thousand times over and giant hugs to each and every one of you:) Colour on my friends!
